title: Interpretation of a dream about the corpse of a married woman

preview.html: If the chest of the dead person is from someone else that she did not know before, then this indicates the kindness and livelihood that the dreamer will gain. Interpretation of seeing the chest of the dead person in a dream for a single girl: If an unmarried girl dreams that she is hugging the dead, then her deceased father was also in the dream, and she was very happy in The dream. This indicates a prolongation of the life that the unmarried girl will live. She is in good health and enjoys good health and abundant food, God willing. If the unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is hugging the deceased and there is a person she did not know before in her life and she was very happy about this. Hugging. This indicates that this dreaming single girl will receive a lot of kindness and nourishment in her life. She is doing good deeds in her life. And seeing an unmarried woman in a dream, and that her deceased mother was hugging her in a dream, and she was very happy about that in the dream. This indicates This single girl misses her deceased mother a lot in her life. And the dream is evidence of the unmarried woman’s trustworthiness for her mother in the afterlife. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is hugging the deceased and he was someone she had never met or She sees it before in her life. This indicates that this married woman will live long periods of happiness and abundant goodness in her life, God willing. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is embracing the deceased and her father and misses him a lot in life and a lot. This indicates that this married woman She will receive from God Almighty to prolong her life. She will live with good and abundant food. If a married woman sees that she saw the embrace of a dead person in a dream from a living person in life, and she was very happy with this closeness. This indicates great affection and compassion between this married woman and the person she saw in the dream. And God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of seeing the bosom of the deceased in a dream for the divorced woman: If the divorced woman saw in a dream that she was looking at the bosom of the deceased in a dream, and felt a lot of happiness and comfort in the dream. Here the meaning indicates that this divorced dreamer will achieve success in her life. And eat a lot of food. Without stressing her out or exhausting her. If a divorced woman sees that she is hugging her deceased mother in a dream and she misses her very much and cries over her separation in the dream. This indicates that this divorced woman will live long periods of great comfort, kindness, and abundance in her life. If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she wants to hug the deceased in The dream.- But he could not do that in the dream. This indicates a major problem or something that will afflict this divorced woman in her life at this time and in this period, and God Almighty knows best. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing blood in a dream

preview.html: Seeing blood coming out of the ear in a dream, point and point Seeing blood coming out of the ear in a dream means that a person will come and hear happy news, and this news will be a departure from his distress and his release from his relative in front of him and his entire family, so this vision shows distance. Of all the evils and difficulties that Satan whispers to him, and God knows best. A dream about blood coming out of the eye in a dream. As for the blood that is coming out of the eye, it does not harm the dreamer whether he is a man or a woman, and this indicates permission to see blood coming out of the eye in a dream. Or someone trespassed on his money and possessions, and God knows best. Also, seeing blood flowing from his right eye indicates that this person has forgotten his duties and distanced himself from his religion, distanced himself from worldly matters, and distanced himself from the religion of God and from what God has pleased and established for him. And God knows best.Interpretation of seeing blood coming out of the mouth in a dream: Ibn Sirin, one of the leading scholars of dream interpretation and visions, tells us about the interpretation of seeing blood coming out of art in a dream that a teenager often eats prohibited money and violates other people’s money and property, or violates it. A woman is not permissible for him, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing blood coming out of the nose in a dream. Scientists have interpreted the dream of seeing blood from the nose in a dream that this person will achieve success and success in his academic life or professional life, and that this person may have a sense of humor, a good CV, and is popular with the general public. People, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing secretions from the chest in a dream. Dream interpretation scholars indicate in their books that the interpretation of a dream of blood coming out of the chest in a dream for a man or a married couple indicates that she will be a great mother and God will give her goodness and raise her children gently. And righteousness almost removes worry, and it also applies to humans, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing blood coming out of the stomach. This dream is delayed for a man, whether he is single or married, and if the teenager is single and never married, then God will soon give him a good wife, but the matter is different if this person Married, God wills. Give him a good son to support him and support him, but if the woman is single, God can give her a good husband, and if she is married or married and pregnant, God will protect her. . And Hassan Khalifa, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing blood coming out of the hand in a dream When you see a dream of blood coming out of the hand, books, or both hands, God will provide this person with a good job and increase his money and strength, and God will give him goodness and success, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of blood coming out of the hand The vagina of a virgin: When an unmarried girl sees blood flowing from her vagina, it is one of the good visions that indicate goodness for her and the nearness of her engagement and marriage, God willing. It is also one of the dreams that symbolize happiness, comfort, freedom from worries and problems, and protection from enemies and envy, God willing. Interpretation of seeing blood coming out of The ear in a dream. Interpretation of seeing blood coming out of the ear in a dream is one of the desired visions that show the dreamer that he heard the good news, God willing. Seeing blood on the ground in a dream. title: Interpretation of fighting in a dream for one girl

preview.html:
Race in a dream of an unmarried girl or an unmarried woman is primarily an illustration of her struggle with the rights of life. It also depicts her desire to reach a prominent position in society. If an unmarried woman sees that she is running on a track and her enemy is running fast, this is a positive sign, because in the end this dream translates into an effective energy inherent in the same insight that can give her brilliance and distinction in the future in the field that interests her or the thing that she wants to achieve.Interpretation Dream of matches in the dream of a male and female studentMost of the girls who see matches in their dreams are university students, because the scene of matches in the dream perfectly simulates exams and discussions. If a male or female student sees that she is running with her colleagues or friends and wearing sneakers on her feet, this means that she is well prepared for exams If he dreams that he wins this race or takes first place, then this is a clear indicator in the dream that heralds the dreamer’s success in that year. Perhaps the dream indicates obtaining a first degree or obtaining a prestigious degree, such as a bachelor’s or master’s degree. But if the student sees that the path he is running on is full of obstacles, this indicates a difficult academic year in which he must make more efforts to achieve the goal of success. If If he stumbles or falls during the race, this may translate into not being well prepared for the exam stage, and in the meantime he must make a lot of effort and make up for what he lost in time to catch up with the passers-by. Interpretation of the tribe in the dream of an engaged girl: If an unmarried woman is engaged or emotionally linked to a person and she sees in her dream that she is in a race with other people, this indicates how keen the girl is to complete the marriage matter as quickly as possible. If she sees in a dream that she is running quickly and overtaking Others in her running and running, this indicates good preparation for the subject of marriage, which is primarily psychological preparation, in addition to physical preparation such as preparing the device. Furniture, apartment, furniture, clothes, etc. are marriage arrangements. If a single woman sees in a dream that she is running with great difficulty, or if she sees that the girls who are running with her have advanced to reach the finish line, this indicates that there are some obstacles that may hinder her. Of completing the marriage matter on time. Interpretation of fighting in a dream for a single woman looking for a job or a partner. Some girls deal with waking up with the issue of finding a job, and others have the idea of ​​socializing as the main obsession that dominates their thinking. In both cases, the dream of fighting depicts how interested an unmarried girl is in achieving these goals before she reaches old age, which may eventually turn into a real obstacle or obstacle that prevents her from achieving these basic and necessary goals.
ZOE.If an unmarried woman is looking for work and sees in her dream that she is in a race with the enemy or running, and the running in the dream is good or fast, then by the grace of God Almighty she will be entitled to

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a complete screwdriver in a dream?

preview.html: Trend offers you what is the interpretation of seeing a screwdriver. The screwdriver is known to loosen joints, screws and bolts. Seeing a screwdriver in a dream is one of the visions that appear in some people's dreams. Therefore, we have collected for you, dear God, everything related to knowing the interpretation of seeing a screwdriver in Dream Interpretation - one of the books of major scholars in the interpretation of dreams and visions. We also present to you fans the interpretation of why a screwdriver dreams in a dream alone, for married and pregnant women, as well as men. If you are interested in knowing what a screwdriver dreams about, then you should read the articleInterpretation of a screwdriver by Ibn Sirin in a dreamThe interpretation of seeing a screwdriver in a dream is complete, as Ibn Sirin suggests, and this may indicate the disintegration of the family. A screwdriver in a dream can be a sign that some things Separated and the areas of the dreamer's life are expanding. Also, the dreamer's attempt to unscrew the screw with a screwdriver in a dream is complete evidence of an attempt to save him from worries and problems. Seeing a screwdriver in some dreams indicates the desire to succeed in work and overcome all consequences and obstacles. See also: Why dream Seeing pins in a dream in full Why dream of a screwdriver in a dream in full The interpretation of a screwdriver is evidence that the dreamer helps people in their life affairs and helps those in need. Seeing a large set of screwdrivers in a dream is one of the visions that indicate that the dreamer will collect a lot for a living. Seeing a complete screwdriver in a dream trying to arrange things in the house is evidence of the happy changes that will happen to the dreamer in his life. See also: Why dream of seeing a complete screw in a dream? Why dream of a screwdriver? Some interpretation researchers have reported that the presence of screwdrivers in a dream indicates to the dreamer that the doors Existence will open. Seeing screwdrivers in a dream complete, and the dreamer used them for an important matter, says that he is free of worries and problems. Why dream of a screwdriver for lonely people? Seeing a lonely girl carrying a screwdriver and trying to unscrew an iron screw is a sign that she will find a new job. Also, selling a screwdriver Screws in a dream for an unmarried woman – indicates that asceticism lives in her life and is a sign of well-being in life. See also: Why does a rope dream in a dream? Interpretation of seeing a screwdriver for a married woman. Seeing a screwdriver for a married woman in a complete dream is evidence of the good news that she will hear soon. Indicates Interpretation of a screwdriver in a dream to a good husband and a sign of food with good heirs and good misfortunes. Seeing a screwdriver for a woman in a dream full is one of the good visions that guide her to goodness and a new life. See also: Why do you dream of seeing a key and its meaning in a dream? Why does a pregnant woman dream of a screwdriver Screws? Seeing a screwdriver for a pregnant woman in a dream is a sign of the approaching date of her birth and the ease of giving birth to a healthy and prosperous child. We also found in some interpretation books that seeing a complete screwdriver in a pregnant woman’s dream seemed to her to be evidence that she is blessed with a baby girl. Why?

Interpretation of a dream of harassment of a mother in a dream. Harassment portends bad, and God knows all that is not seen. Where if a married man sees harassment in a dream, this may be evidence of pleasures and desires, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a young man sees harassment in a dream, it can express harm. Which affects both parties, and God knows everything that no one has seen. If the dreamer sees harassment in a dream, it may be a sign of illegal money and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreams that I was in contact with my girlfriend in a dream. Interpretation of dreams that I was in contact with my girlfriend in a dream, it could indicate cooperation Or a joint project, God willing. Likewise, if a married man sees intercourse with his girlfriend, this may lead him to a high position, and God knows best. If a single young man sees in a dream having intercourse with his girlfriend, this may be a sign of the collapse of problems, God willing. When the dreamer sees intercourse with his girlfriend in a dream, this may represent Achieving goals, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of dreams that I called a woman I do not know in a dream. Interpretation of dreams that I called a woman I do not know in a dream. Whereas if the dreamer sees himself connected to a beautiful, unknown woman in a dream, it may portend goodness, and God knows the unseen. If a young man sees in a dream intercourse with an ugly, unknown woman It can express things that are not good, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of the dream of marrying a beautiful woman in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of marrying a beautiful woman in a dream can indicate goodness, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees the marriage of a beautiful woman, it may lead to much good, and God knows everything. Unseen. If a married man sees an ugly woman marrying in a dream, this may be a sign of undesirable matters, and God is Most High and All-Knowing, as there may be evidence of loss, and God knows the unseen. title: Interpretation of a dream about a phone call from a dead person in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a phone call from a dead person in a dream. Today, let's find out all the interpretations about seeing a call from a dead person in a dream. Today, let us discuss it in detail. Interpretation of a dream of a phone call from a dead person in a dream Everyone who dreams of a dead person relates to it, because it is a sign of many good things. Dreaming of receiving a phone call from a dead person is a sign of good news. Seeing a dead person calling him in a dream is a sign On his request for prayer and charity. When you see a dead person, call him in a dream, indicating the psychological peace in which the dreamer lives. Interpretation of a dream about a phone call from a familiar person in a dream. A person who sees in his dream that he is communicating with a girl he knows in a dream is a sign of their imminent marriage. Seeing a married woman calling him or vice versa is a sign that good news has reached her. A call from someone she knows in a dream is an indication of the end of crises and disagreements in her life. Dreaming of seeing a call from someone in a dream is a sign of good things that will happen to him soon. Interpretation Dreaming of a conversation with someone you love in a dream Whoever sees in his dream that he is talking on the phone with someone he loves is a sign of repairing the relationship between them. To dream of seeing someone you love talking after waking up in a dream is a sign of the attention you need to get from this person. When you see yourself You receive a call from a lover in a dream, this is an indication of the support that this person provides you. Whoever sees in his dream that he is talking at length with the lover in the dream, which indicates the sincerity of the feelings between them. Interpretation of the dream of calling the king in a dream Whoever sees in a dream that he is talking with the king, this is a sign However, goodness is coming to him. Talking to the king in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of easy childbirth. If the person talking to the king in the dream sees a sign of tension and sadness, he will overcome it. Seeing the king and talking to him in a dream is a sign of overcoming enemies and victories. Which he will achieve soon. Interpretation of a dream about crying on the phone in a dream: Whoever dreams that he is crying is an indication of the anguish and anxiety that he feels. If you dream of seeing him crying while talking to someone on the phone, this is a sign of the negative emotions that he is feeling at that time. When Seeing her crying on the phone is a sign of an emotional imbalance in his life. Seeing her crying while talking on the phone is a sign that her old outbursts are gone. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-husband, calling me in a dream Talking to one person on the phone and receiving threats is a sign On the anxiety and tension in which he lives. Seeing a conversation with a free man in a dream is a sign of intense hatred for him in reality. When she sees a conversation with an ex-husband in a dream, this is an indication of the imminent pregnancy of her current husband. Talking to an ex-husband in a dream is a sign of remorse On past actions. Interpretation of a dream about calling the police in a dream: Whoever dreams that he is talking to a policeman on the phone, this is a sign of problems and crises that he faces. Calling a policeman

title: Interpretation of a dream about buying shoes in a dream

preview.html: Each of us is happy when we buy anything new, even if it is shoes, but since the appearance of some dreams is associated with some future events related to the dreamer, many people may wonder what it means to buy shoes in a dream? We will explain this in detail for both men and women. Interpretation of a dream about court in a dream. Buying shoes in a dream for a single woman. Ibn Shaheen says that an unmarried girl who buys new shoes enters a new step in her life that brings her happiness. If a single girl buys white shoes in a dream, this is one of Signs that this girl's marriage is approaching within a few months. Ibn Sirin says that an unmarried girl who buys new elegant shoes will find a prestigious job that she was looking for in the previous days. New shoes generally in a girl's dream indicate the arrival of that girl in her dreams and goals. If the shoe In the past, in a dream of an unmarried girl, this may be one of the signs that this girl has returned to her former lover. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a brother in a dream. Interpretation of shoe size in dreams. Dream Interpreters: Tight shoes in a man or woman’s dream indicate a tight situation and a financial problem that may pass. The size of the shoes in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the difficulty or ease of childbirth, and if they are narrow, this indicates a cesarean section or that there are problems with the birth. Birth. On the other hand, if the shoes are comfortable for her, this indicates an easy birth. Interpretation of a dream about seeing lice in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about buying new shoes for a married woman. Dream interpreters confirm that a married woman who buys new shoes indicates that this woman will be pregnant and give birth to a child. If the owner Dreaming of being an employee or working in one of the professions, buying new shoes may indicate that this woman will be promoted in this job. Some commentators believe that a married woman who wants to buy new shoes and is not satisfied with her married life may be the result of an internal feeling in that woman that she wants to divorce her husband and get married. From another man. Interpretation of a dream about a jellyfish in a dream. Shoes in a dream for a pregnant woman. Al-Nabulsi says that dark-colored shoes may indicate the birth of a boy, while light-colored shoes may indicate the birth of a girl. Ibn Sirin says that new shoes worn by a pregnant woman indicate the birth of a boy. Until the next baby will be the reason for the arrival of a new source of livelihood for that woman. If the shoes seen in the pregnant woman’s dream were tight on her, this may be the result of the intense pressure and feeling of tension that this woman suffers from during pregnancy. Interpretation of a dream about a weapon in a dream. A gift from Shoes in a dream for a married woman. Ibn Sirin says that the shoes that the husband gives as a gift to the wife indicate the appearance of pregnancy for her, especially if the pregnancy is delayed. The gift that a married woman receives from one of her acquaintances is one of the indications that she will receive a benefit from the person who gives his shoes.

title: Interpretation of a dream about eating watermelon in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about watermelon by Ibn SirinInterpretation of a dream about seeing a watermelon in a dream, as narrated by Ibn Sirin, that the dreamer is looking for money and power. Also, seeing a lot of watermelons in a dream means that the dreamer will lose some close people. Seeing a green watermelon in a dream is one of the visions that predict the dreamer's health, well-being, and improving conditions. But seeing him eating watermelon seeds indicates the presence of an unruly or abnormal son, which also indicates bad speech. Interpretation of a watermelon in a dream by Sheikh Sayed HamdiThe venerable Sheikh Saeed Hamdi indicated that when you see a watermelon in a dream, it is a source of livelihood, money, and many good things. Also, seeing a watermelon in a dream is evidence of the inheritance that the dreamer will receive from his parents. Also, seeing a watermelon being planted in a dream is one of the desired visions and an indication of the fulfillment of desires. Seeing a watermelon in a dream has many meanings to bring good luck to the world. Al-Osaimi's dream of watermelon Watermelon in a dream is a sign of happiness and that the dreamer hears important and good news about his personal life. Seeing a watermelon in a dream indicates goodness and benevolence and is a sign of the dreamer's recovery And an end to worries and problems. Seeing a lumpy or white watermelon from the inside in a dream indicates difficulties, problems and bad luck. Having a small watermelon or a camel in a dream is one of the visions that indicate that the dreamer will achieve his desires and goals. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a watermelon in a dream Cutting a watermelon in a dream for a single woman Interpretation of seeing a watermelon in a dream for an unmarried woman is good news and a livelihood, and it is one of the praiseworthy visions for a girl in her life. Interpretation of seeing a watermelon in a dream for an unmarried girl can be the beginning of a new relationship and soon marriage for her, God knows. Also, eating a green watermelon in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates an abundance of sustenance with a lot of money that the dreamer will get. The appearance of a large number of watermelons in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates her marriage to a person of status and power, God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing peaches in a dream Interpretation of eating a watermelon in a dream for a married woman Seeing a married woman in a dream with a watermelon means that she will get a lot of money in her next life, God knows best. Commentators indicate that a married woman Eating watermelon in a dream indicates that she is close to pregnancy, and God knows best. Seeing watermelon in a married woman’s dream indicates goodness and fair success, and it is one of the good visions for her, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. See also: What is the interpretation of a dream about seeing kiwi in a dream in detail? Interpretation of a dream about watermelon in a dream for a pregnant woman The presence of watermelon in a pregnant woman’s dream is an indication that her due date is imminent. Watermelon in a pregnant woman’s dream can be good news for her that she will give birth to a little girl, and God knows what is in the wombs. Seeing eating watermelon in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the ease of her birth and the health of her fetus, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about watermelon for a man Seeing an unmarried young man in his dream with a watermelon means a short marriage, and God knows best. For a married man in a dream, he saw himself cutting

title: A detailed interpretation of the letter M in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the muezzin in Nabulsi. The muezzin in the dream is one of the signs that indicate a person who calls people to goodness and justice. Hearing the voice of the muezzin during the Hajj period indicates the nearness of Hajj or Umrah, and seeing the unknown muezzin in the dreamer is a sign of power and influence, and God knows best. The shovel in a dream. The shovel in a single person’s dream indicates To a soon marriage, and the shovel is a symbol of a woman who does not hide a secret, a will, or money. A spade can foretell money, the death of misfortunes, worries, troubles, and the repayment of debts. Or is it a symbol of an honest man. To see a shovel in his hand is a sign of goodness, great generosity, and blessing, and God knows best. Barbecue in a dream. The incense burner ( The one carrying burning embers) denotes a woman and refers to praise and faith, and an extinguished incense burner denotes troubles and family instability. Jeans in a dream and a gin are a symbol of one who seeks to enjoin good and forbid evil. It is also a sign of satisfying needs, good offspring, and abundant profit. It is also a sign of the emergence of Truth and the death of falsehood, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about Medina Medina is one of the symbols of goodness, praiseworthy and auspicious, and the best for the dreamer in his religious and worldly affairs. The nail in the dream: The nail refers to the caliph, the prince, or the owner of power and influence. The nail is the one who seeks to satisfy the needs of the people, and the hammered nail portends an imminent marriage. Swallowing nails is a sign of extreme anger, or one who befriends people, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about apricots: Apricots are a sign of money. If the vision is in season or not, it portends the fortuneteller’s illness. Apricots are a sign of a useless person. Breaking an apricot is a sign of strife and enmity, and yellow. Apricots mean illness and a sign of hypocrisy or abandonment of obedience. Seeing apricots. Sour is an indication of the worries and sorrows that befall the dreamer, and the best dream is to see green apricots and an abundance of food and goodness, and God knows best. Rain in a dream for Nabulsi. Rain is a tidings of goodness, sustenance, and mercy that falls upon the dreamer, or it is a promise that is fulfilled. Rain can indicate distress and anxiety specifically when the rain is harmful to the pioneer and rain from the sky or rain of blood or stones, indicates committing sins and disobedience or not completing the journey. Rain in a dream is a sign of goodness and blessing in the life of the dreamer, or renewed hope after despair Severe and disappointing. Interpretation of a dream about death according to Nabulsi: Death in a dream is one of the symbols that indicate the release of worries, the disappearance of problems and distress, recovery from illness, or the return of the absent. Death in a dream can symbolize a lack of religion or corruption in it. As for seeing the dreamer’s death in a dream other than the manifestations of that death, it is evidence of travel, poverty, or submission to enemies, and the afterlife indicates the disappearance of poverty, repentance from sin, or intimate marriage, and God knows best. The scale in Nabulsi’s dreamThe scale is a sign of justice and dignity, the removal of worries, the settlement of debts, and the fulfillment of commandments, and the descent of the scale from the sky indicates truth and the disappearance of falsehood. The scale of money indicates testimony, lying, lying, and
